id.description: The ID of the package (Non-duplicated alphanumeric characters. Use a file name that represents the package. If there is no representative name, use the archive file name. If there is a possibility of duplication, such as only one word, prefix it with the developer's name.)

name.description: The name of the package (Up to 25 characters)

overview.description: The overview of the package (Up to 35 characters)

developer.description: The name of the developer of the package

originalDeveloper.description: The name of the developer of the package from which it was derived

dependencies.description: ID of the package on which it depends

latestVersion.description: The latest version of the package

filename.description: The name of the file used in the package

isDirectory.description: Whether it is a directory (Default: false)
